name: Make Your Offer
tag_list: e-books, self-publishing, indie-authors, ebooks, reading, kindle, epub
overview:
MYO provides a service which makes it easy to find books you love, and people who love to read.

We use the power of a social network and community of book lovers to help spread the word and make selling your e-books easy. Members are able to keep in touch with their favourite authors and they can use the “make your offer” system to get a great deal on e-books.

We allow members to purchase e-books at a price that is agreed between the author and the reader. This means more people are able to read your e-book than they would if you set a fixed price.
